description: Delete all 3's from the sequence of nonnegative integers.
comments: Very similar to A004178, except that 3-repdigits (A002277) are completely removed from the sequence, whereas in A004178 has 0s in their place. It is thus guaranteed that a(n) = n only when n < 3. - _Alonso del Arte_, Oct 18 2012
links: Alonso del Arte, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9998
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
